special_text:
Whenever Z is dealt damage if that damage would cause Z to die, prevent that damage and transform Z instead.
[+2]: Until your next turn, no more than one creature can attack Z each combat.
[-2]: Exile target creature or battle, then return it to the battlefield under its owners control.
[-7]: You get an emblem with non-Z permanents you don't control can't transform or enter the battlefield transformed.
special_text2: [-X]: Choose X nonland permanents, exile each nonland permanent not chosen this way.
